description:
She is used to doing normal scenes, but to bring her into a training session is a different story. She has been bound before and has an understanding of BDSM, but never trained. We make sure that she gets a full taste of what we are doing here at TToO, and it seems she has a true desire to serve.
She is strung up, tortured, and made to show just how much of a cock whore she really is. I will access her further and then see if she has an interest to petition for future training.
title: Mia Lelani
